name: Hardest Video Voyeur #7: Sugarland Trivia Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Sugarland video has Jennifer Nettles surfing and dancing around in a bikini?
questions.explanation:
All I Want to Do.

	Shaun Silva directed the video for "All I Want to Do", which premiered in 2009. At the CMT awards, "All I Want to Do" was nominated for Best Country Music video.

questions.text: Sugarland's first country music video was for which of their songs?
questions.explanation:
Baby Girl.

	The video for "Baby Girl" came out in 2004. It was directed by Peter Zavadil and was the first country music video for the group Sugarland.

questions.text: What Sugarland video has Jennifer Nettles stalking, kidnapping, and drugging a possible ex-boyfriend?
questions.explanation:
Stuck Like Glue.

	The video for "Stuck Like Glue" was officially released on August 6, 2010. Ryan McPartlin played the part of the kidnapped man. Lead singer Jennifer Nettles played the deranged ex-girlfriend. The video was directed by Kenny Orgeta. Ryan McPartlin can be seen on NBC's "Chuck" as Devon "Captain Awesome" Woodcomb.

questions.text: Sugarland's Jennifer Nettles and Kristian Bush cruise around in a grocery store for which one of their music videos?
questions.explanation:
Everyday America.

	"Everyday America" takes place in a grocery store with Jennifer and Kristian riding around in a grocery cart while someone pushes them around. The video was produced by Rocky Schenck.

questions.text: A young girl leaving home and then breaking up with her boyfriend is shown between scenes of Jennifer and Kristian standing on top of cars while the sun sets behind them. What Sugarland video is this?
questions.explanation:
Already Gone.

	ITunes picked up the video and released it in September 2008, days before it was officially released to CMT and GAC. The young girl in the video is a representation of Jennifer Nettles when she left home for the first time and then broke up with her boyfriend. Shaun Silva directed this video.

questions.text: Prophetic of the song's lyrics, Jennifer Nettles hitches a ride with several people in this music video for what Sugarland song?
questions.explanation:
Something More.

	Jennifer Nettles hitches a ride with several people looking for "something more". The video was directed by Paul Boyd in 2005. One of the rides Jennifer accepts is from her band members Kristian Bush and Kristin Hall.

questions.text: Which Sugarland video has Jennifer Nettles singing as a mistress begging her lover to stay with her and then to stay away from her?
questions.explanation:
Stay.

	Shaun Silva directed this simple music video in 2007 based on what Sugarland wanted to do. Jennifer Nettles wanted the video to be simple and emotional. The video ranked number ten in CMT's top 100 videos and ranked number four in country music videos of the decade.

questions.text: On a revolving platform, Jennifer Nettles and a band sing and play to a crowd revealed behind the walls of the room they're playing in. What Sugarland video is this?
questions.explanation:
Settling.

	The video came out in 2006. Sugarland and their band stood on a revolving circular platform singing. Halfway through the video, the wall behind them moved revealing a crowd of fans. Paul Boyd directed the video.

questions.text: Sugarland's Jennifer Nettles cut her hair in this video as she undressed in front of a mirror. In what video did this dramatic change occur?
questions.explanation:
Keep You.

	"Keep You" came out in 2009 and the video was nominated for Duo Video of the Year in 2010. Jennifer Nettles transitioned from long hair to short hair in a matter of minutes during the course of this video.  Shaun Silva directed this video.

questions.text: Jennifer Nettles leaves her boyfriend's bed to get on the tour bus, while Kristian walks past a small 9/11 memorial to get to the tour bus. What video is this?
questions.explanation:
Want To.

	"Want To" was the first music video to consist only of Jennifer Nettles and Kristian Bush as a duo for Sugarland. It's a simple video centering on Jennifer leaving her boyfriend's bed to prepare to join her tour bus while Kristian walks through the New York streets en route to the same tour bus. Shaun Silva directed this video.
